title: Services — Tao of Wellness
cleaned_text: Our Therapies Much of what we do at Tao Of Wellness has been in practice for thousands of years. [Drs. Daoshing & Mao Shing Ni](/about) are themselves 38th generation practitioners of Chinese Medicine. Our clinic offers every major Chinese medical modality along with well-studied contemporary therapies, integrating patient care with the best medicine from both the East and West. What is Your Health Concern? Traditional Chinese medicine cares for the whole person. As primary care physicians, our doctors are here to care for any person at any age for any condition. Tao Of Wellness uses customized, natural therapies to enable your body to heal itself.
